Name: RSNA International COVID-19 Open Radiology Database (RICORD)
Type of data: CXR and thoracic CT datasets

Name: The Cancer Imaging Archive (TCIA)
Type of data: Multi-modality imaging datasets (all cancer)

Name: UK Biobank
Type of data: Register and apply

Name: Dementia Platform UK
Type of data: Big data working and synthetic dataset

Name: NeuroImaging Tools & Resources Collaboratory (NITRC)
Type of data: Multiple neuroimaging datasets (MR/PET/CT)

Name: Open Access Series of Imaging Studies (OASIS)
Type of data: Neuroimaging datasets (MR/PET) Longitudinal

Name: Stanford University Center for Artificial Intelligence in Medicine & Imaging (AIMI) shared datasets
Type of data: Multi-modality (CXR; lower extremity x-ray; knee MRI; bone age x-ray; ECHO; brain CT) including large datasets used for RSNA annual AI challenges

Name: COPD Machine Learning Datasets
Type of data: HRCT Thorax datasets

Name: Brain Tumor Segmentation Challenge (BraTS) – Center for Biomedical Image Computing & Analytics, University of Pennsylvania
Type of data: Oncological brain MRI datasets

Name: University of South Florida Digital Mammography Datasets
Type of data: Mammography datasets (lossless JPEG not DICOM)

Name: Kaggle Grand Challenge Imaging Datasets
Type of data: Multiple imaging datasets (> 100) used in commercial grand challenges

Name: National Institute of Health Data Archive (NDA)
Type of data: Several data repositories including neuroimaging and musculoskeletal imaging datasets

Name: Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)
Type of data: MRI and PET neuroimaging datasets

Name: National Biomedical Imaging Archive (NBIA)
Type of data: Searchable repository of imaging datasets used in development and validation of analytical software tools

Name: Swiss Institute for Computer Assisted Surgery (SICAS) Medical Image Repository
Type of data: Various medical imaging datasets (brain, liver, post-mortem imaging)

Name: American College of Radiology Data Science Institute (ACRDSI) Dataset Directory
Type of data: Collated directory of imaging datasets (cancer; CXR; mammography; MSK)

Name: NHSX National COVID-19 Chest Image Database (NCCID)
Type of data: CXR and CT datasets with clinical meta-data

Name: OPTIMAM
Type of data: Mammograms including real and simulated images of cancer

Name: Aylward.org
Type of data: Lists a large compilation of open-access medical image repositories

Name: HDR UK Innovation Gateway
Type of data: >500 datasets but not many are include imaging currently

Name: KCL
Type of data: Healthy adult brain pet/mr and ct
